players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it suspicious that Bob was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who could have done it quickly before more are lost."
Charlie: "Bob's death is tragic. Diana, you seem very eager to start pointing fingers - that itself could be suspicious. Let's hear from Alice before jumping to conclusions."
You: "I have information that might help. I investigated Charlie last night and found out he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "Alice's claim is serious and could explain a lot. Charlie, how do you respond to this accusation? We need clear answers before we vote."
You: "I stand by my investigation results. Voting out Charlie now is the only way to save the town. Delaying will only give the mafioso more time to kill."

Charlie: "Alice, that's a bold claim to make. If you were really the detective, why would you expose yourself so openly? A real detective would be more careful. Diana, Alice is trying to manipulate us."
